Instance Method# dropFirst(_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func dropFirst(_ count: Int = 1) -> Publishers.Sequence<DropFirstSequence<Elements>, Failure>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/dropFirst(_:)#see-also)
